Text: Just so everyone knows, this is NOT "The Name of the Doctor". It is "Nightmare in Silver". It's just mislabeled.

The numbering is ambiguous, due to the Christmas special being directly in the canon timeline, in the middle of the season.

It isn't incorrect, but the title of the episode should be included.
Nightmare in Silver is the 12th episode.  Pay attention.  And here I was like, "Did we get a longer season for a change?"
